item.title: Help wit project czar source "pickup" command make it work for silabs?
item.dc:creator: @Kalphiter Kalphiter
item.description:
@Kalphiter wrote:

if (command.startsWith("pickup") && (playerRights >= 2) || (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("owner fiftee")) { try { int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(7,12)); int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(13)); if (newItemID <= 30000 && newItemID >= 0) { addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount); } else { sendMessage("That item doesn't exist."); } } catch(Exception e) { sendMessage("Wrong syntax! Use as ::pickup 00995 10!"); } }

Read full topic

item.title: Help wit project czar source "pickup" command make it work for silabs?
item.dc:creator: @BACON555 BACON555
item.description:
@BACON555 wrote:

okay title really says it all… how do i make the pickup command work for 5 numbers so i can pickup silab items? and how can i convert it to a “silabs” server to have silab items like skill capes and stuff i have a good client barely any nulls ftw lol but still how do i do that? thanks for any help heres my command code } else if (command.startsWith("pickup") && (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("owner fiftee") || playerRights >= 2)) { try { int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(7,11)); int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(12)); if (/*newItemID <= 20000 && */newItemID >= 0) { addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount); } else { sendMessage("No such item."); } } catch(Exception e) { sendMessage("Wrong Syntax! Use as ::pickup 00995 10"); }

Read full topic
